comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
# Sorry. The website is infected by AdShield, Inc.

Unfortunately, It is complicated to resolve with a regular adblock rule because the website is being protected by service of Ad-Shield that is an anti-adblock company.

## Userscript Installation
Please block Ad-Shield advertisement by installing [tinyShield userscript](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield).
Please check its installation guideline written in English by visiting [this URL](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.md).

If you can understand Korean language, please refer https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/blob/main/README.ko.md.

<details>
<summary>Detailed description for iOS users</summary>

1. Install [**Usercripts**](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/userscripts/id1463298887) app
2. Enable **Usercripts** extension in Safari settings
	* iOS 18+: `System settings` => `Apps` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	* iOS 17 and older: `System settings` => `Safari` => `Extensions`
	Find **Usercripts**, enable it and allow `On other sites` permission
4. Open the [tinyShield ](https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/@list-kr/tinyshield@latest/dist/tinyShield.user.js) userscript URL in browser
5. Press the extensions icon in the address bar of Safari and select Userscripts 
6. Tap to install
7. In opened popup, scroll down and press Install button
8. Done.

</details>

## Still Have a Problem?
An issue is occurred when the userscript is applied, please report to [this issue tracker](https://github.com/List-KR/tinyShield/issues).

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Trackers)
 [https://montanablackmerch.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmontanablackmerch.com%2F)
### Comment
> This website is a fake merch site of the well-known German influencer MontanaBlack88. His official shop is at https://montanablack.de/ (currently closed according to him). On the fake site, clicking "Shop" or "Store" redirects to an external URL (https://teestow.com/product-category/montana-black-merch). Under "Contact," it shows a U.S. address (123 Fifth Avenue, NY 10160, New York), but his real shop is operated only in Germany, where he lives. I have already reported this site to Google Safe Browsing. Maybe you can block it via DNS Filter.
```
Username: @hArDsTyLe2000
```

comment.body:
Checking the dashboard, the blocked service is app-measurement.com.
However, it is a generic service, which I believe the Google Phone app tries to access to query spam lists. I don't think I'm the only person who, since installing the AdGuard DNS filter, no longer has spam calls filtered, but I haven't found anything about it online.

issue.body: ### Prerequisites - [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml); - [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue; - [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date; - [x] Browser version is up-to-date; - [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue. ### What product do you use? AdGuard DNS, AdGuard for Windows, AdGuard Browser Extension, AdGuard Content Blocker ### AdGuard version latest ### What type of problem have you encountered? Website or app doesn't work properly ### Which browser(s) do you use? other (specify in comment below) ### Which device do you use? Desktop ### Where is the problem encountered? https://sfb.bio.link ### Ad Blocking AdGuard Base filter ### Privacy AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter ### Social Widgets AdGuard Social Media filter ### Annoyances AdGuard Annoyances filter ### Security Online Malicious URL Blocklist, Phishing URL Blocklist ### Other AdGuard Experimental filter ### DNS filters AdGuard DNS filter ### Language-specific AdGuard German filter ### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled? _No response_ ### Add your comment and screenshots Hey, so bio.link gets blocked by both adguardDNS and My Adguard Client on Mac and WIndows Access blocked by AdGuard DNS: Dangerous website AdGuard DNS blocked access to thm.bio.link because it’s in our database of phishing and malicious domains The reason seems to be safebrowsing. Blocking the entire domain should not be needed. Blocking v2stats.bio.link analytics.bio.link is not the problem The problem is blocking PROFILENAME.bio.link bio.link/PROFILENAME cdn.bio.link I know someone who is friends with the owner, and the platform is NOT problematic. Some content is, but so is any website. Please keep me up to date on the issue by pinging @SpotlightForBugs Thank you ;D ### Privacy - [x] I agree to follow this condition
